descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/sSbds.png[/img][/url][/center]

[youtube]S4xhgAOPVPs[/youtube]
================================================================
	The Elder Scrolls V
	     Skyrim

   Glowing Ore Veins 300 | 2.00

Textures By, 
	-Baratan

Special Thanks to,
	-Bethsoft Game Studio
================================================================
	Installation instructions
----------------------------------------------------------------
1- Extract the archive to your \"Skyrim/Data\" folder.

2- Launch Skyrim

If you are updating from an older version, and not using the Nexus mod manager.
-Browse to your Skyrim/Data/Textures folder and delete the cubemaps folder.

If you are updating from an older version, and you are using the Nexus mod manager.
-Make sure you uninstall the previous versions of this mod.
================================================================
	Mod Description
----------------------------------------------------------------
This mod serves to make the game\'s ore veins much more visible, 
especially in darker environments. It accomplishes this by 
replacing the cubemap textures used by ore veins. This gives
them a glow that appears brighter as the ambient lighting
becomes darker.
Without the mod, ore veins are very difficult to see and really 
don\'t stand out much against the rocks around them.
The new version changes the meshes to use new cubemaps instead of
modifying the game\'s original cubemaps. So the ore veins are the
only things affected by this mod.
================================================================
	Version History
----------------------------------------------------------------
2.00
-Rebuilt the mod form the ground up.
-Meshes point to new cubemaps so the original cubemaps are untouched.
-This mod no longer affects the textures of non-vein objects.

1.30
-Redid Ebony Ore to be more visible.

1.20
-Redid the Iron texture. Is no longer purple. Is now a color closer to oxidized Iron. Reddish-brown.

1.10
-Created new Textures for Iron, Corundum, Orichalcum,  Moonstone and Malachite for greatly increased visibility at the cost of realism. Version 1.00 will remain available for those who do not like the color changes.

1.00
-Initial Release
